title: "Soraka, what is the matter?"
body:
{{champion:16}} "I'm not special any more." 

{{champion:92}} "What?"

{{champion:16}} "I was always the only champion linked with the stars, NOW I'M NOT."

{{champion:92}} "Soraka, we don't know anything yet about this new arrival."

{{champion:16}} "But it is enough! I feel the bars closing in around me, confining me to a cruel fate of thematic greyscale. 

{{champion:92}} "So...does that have something to do with me being in a cage?"

{{champion:16}} "What?"

{{champion:92}} "*This*. These bars, *this cage* I'm stuck in and you are outside of."

{{champion:102}} "Um hello? You're not alone in here."

{{champion:92}} "I might as well be you half-brainless lizard."

{{champion:102}} "Well if I wasn't concentrating so hard trying to tell MY SIDE of the story to penetrate your STUPIDITY I would have needed only half my brain to do it and we would not have been jumped on."

{{champion:16}} "Hey Riven, I would say you got burned, but then again I can't even start a barbeque with Shyvana's fire. It is disgracefully weak." 

{{champion:102}} "*Standard bearer's balls* are you seriously taking her side?"

{{champion:92}} "Stupid? You think I'm stupid?"

{{champion:102}} "I mean, what are you..a half human, goat, unicorn, humi-goaticorn? And seriously, what's the deal with that barbeque near the cage, it's huge."

{{champion:92}} "S-stupid?"

{{champion:16}} "Cage...cage...oh, you mean the food nest!"

{{champion:102}} "The- the what?"

replies.body: What the %%%%, did i just read?
